alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Canadian; Garfield; Kingfisher; Logan; Noble (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 10 at 2:57AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 AM CDT FOR KINGFISHER...SOUTHWESTERN NOBLE...CENTRAL BLAINE...NORTHWESTERN LOGAN...EASTERN GARFIELD AND NORTHWESTERN CANADIAN COUNTIES... At 257 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Billings to near Marshall to 5 miles northeast of Geary, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Enid, Perry, Watonga, Kingfisher, Piedmont, Hennessey, Crescent, Waukomis, Okarche, Garber, Cashion, Covington, Calumet, Dover, Cedar Valley, Red Rock, Marshall, Breckenridge, Mulhall, and Cimarron City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Wind damage with these storms will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. SEEK SHELTER IMMEDIATELY inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Blaine; Canadian; Garfield; Kingfisher; Logan; Noble
